ModMetaData.name: 1/10000 Chance for Withered Foxy Jumpscare Every Second
ModMetaData.author: AlenDio
ModMetaData.description:
Inspired by this terraria mod. Simply, a mod that every seconds checks for a 1/10000 chance to wake up Whitered Foxy and jumpscare you.
DISCLAIMER: Use at your own risk. I strongly recommended not to increase the volume beyond 150%. You've been warned.
